original: Were you beaten with the ugly hammer at birth?  Does the sight of you naked make people heave?  Being ugly is so much worse than being fat - it's out of your control.  God hates you but we don't. Your only option is to spend thousands of dollars to go under the knife and turn yourself into a freak.  Unfortunately, breast enlargement is all that plastic surgery is good for.  Society dictates that unless they are rich or famous, ugly people must mate within their own kind or, occasionally, with a paralytic person from outside the species. It's a bleak picture but there is a glimmer of hope.  Hypnosis!  Think of how great it is to reprogram your mind!  It's brainwashing!  Look at how happy viewers of Weazel News are.  I am an experienced hypnotist and ventriloquist with three years experience on the cabaret circuit.  I have an extremely high success rate and most of my clients need just one session (which is why it is so expensive).  I can brainwash even the most hideous brown-bagger into feeling fuckable.
translated: 你是不是刚出生就一副挫样？你的裸体是否让人退避三舍？长得丑比长得肥还要可怕，因为肥是可以减的，丑是改不掉的。上天讨厌你，但我们不会。你唯一的选择就是花上几千几万动刀子，把自己整成外星人。很不幸，唯一管用的整容手术就是隆胸。社会决定了丑的人只能和同类作伴，除非他是富人或是名人。偶尔丑的人也会和不那么丑的瘫痪病人结婚。尽管前路一片黑暗，但还是存在些许希望的。催眠！想想改造你的思想有多厉害吧！堪称洗脑！看看Weazel新闻的观众活得多幸福吧。我是一个经验老道的催眠师和腹语师，在卡巴莱剧团待过三年。我的成功率很高，大多数客户只需要一个疗程(所以价格才贵)。长相再抱歉的姑娘都会被我洗脑成能操的。

original: You've already developed a great personality to over-compensate for your aesthetic failings.  Take the next step.  Think yourself hot!!!  Email me for prices and appointments.
translated: 你已经靠性格弥补了外貌上的不足。再往前走一步吧，相信自己很性感！！！价格与时间请在邮件中沟通。
